branchCategory.name: EX500 Accessories
branchCategory.description: <p>EX500 a gateway unit to connect EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;,</span> DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;, </span>and Profibus DP® to SMC valves and digital inputs for sensors for distributed I/O system. Each gateway can control up to 8 valve manifolds and 8 input blocks, with maximum of 128 outputs and 128 inputs. EX500-GEN2 supports Device level Ring (DLR) and EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span> Quick Connect function. The gateway module has IP65 protection while valve modules and input blocks have IP67 protection ensuring protection against dust and washdown environment.</p>
